headline: Invesco Launches Invesco QQQ 15 Index
summary: Invesco Indexing LLC, an independent index provider owned by global asset manager Invesco Ltd. (IVZ), announced today the launch of Invesco QQQ 15 Index. Invesco QQQ 15 Index will incorporate equity exposure focused on the Invesco QQQ, with the goal of offering strong risk adjusted returns that seeks to maintain a target volatility of 15%. This index was created specifically for index-linked crediting strategies available on Eagle Life's Select Focus series fixed index annuities.
